document_data.name: ''Gauntlets of Swimming and Climbing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gauntlets of swimming and climbing''''' were magical gauntlets that bestowed the wearer with the ability to swim as fast as a [[triton]] underwater or as fast as a [[merman]] on the surface, and to scale vertical surfaces whether climbing upward or downward.
document_data.Description: These gauntlets appeared normal but would radiate magic if detected. They fit anyone from a [[halfling]] to a large [[human]].
